SAMRAI::geom::SAMRAITransferOperatorRegistry

SAMRAI::geom::SAMRAITransferOperatorRegistry Class Reference

Class SAMRAITransferOperatorRegistry is intended to implement the buildCoarsenOperator, buildRefineOperator and buildTimeInterpolateOperator member functions of TransferOperatorRegistry. More...

#include <source/SAMRAI/geom/SAMRAITransferOperatorRegistry.h>

Protected Member Functions

tbox::Pointer< hier::CoarsenOperator > buildCoarsenOperator (const tbox::Pointer< hier::Variable > &var, const std::string &op_name)
 Builds the SAMRAI CoarsenOperator with name op_name associated with the centering of variable var. Can be specialized by applications which introduce their own CoarsenOperators. Specialized class will add knowledge of how to build application's operators and will call SAMRAITransferOperatorRegistry::buildCoarsenOperator to build a SAMRAI libaray CoarsenOperator.
tbox::Pointer< hier::RefineOperator > buildRefineOperator (const tbox::Pointer< hier::Variable > &var, const std::string &op_name)
 Builds the SAMRAI RefineOperator with name op_name associated with the centering of variable var. Can be specialized by applications which introduce their own RefineOperators. Specialized class will add knowledge of how to build application's operators and will call SAMRAITransferOperatorRegistry::buildRefineOperator to build a SAMRAI libaray RefineOperator.
tbox::Pointer< hier::TimeInterpolateOperator > buildTimeInterpolateOperator (const tbox::Pointer< hier::Variable > &var, const std::string &op_name)
 Builds the SAMRAI TimeInterpolateOperator with name op_name associated with the centering of variable var. Can be specialized by applications which introduce their own TimeInterpolateOperators. Specialized class will add knowledge of how to build application's operators and will call SAMRAITransferOperatorRegistry::buildTimeInterpolateOperator to build a SAMRAI libaray TimeInterpolateOperator.

Detailed Description

Class SAMRAITransferOperatorRegistry is intended to implement the buildCoarsenOperator, buildRefineOperator and buildTimeInterpolateOperator member functions of TransferOperatorRegistry.

See also:
hier::TransferOperatorRegistry

Member Function Documentation

tbox::Pointer< hier::CoarsenOperator > SAMRAI::geom::SAMRAITransferOperatorRegistry::buildCoarsenOperator ( const tbox::Pointer< hier::Variable > &  var,
const std::string &  op_name 
) [protected, virtual]

Builds the SAMRAI CoarsenOperator with name op_name associated with the centering of variable var. Can be specialized by applications which introduce their own CoarsenOperators. Specialized class will add knowledge of how to build application's operators and will call SAMRAITransferOperatorRegistry::buildCoarsenOperator to build a SAMRAI libaray CoarsenOperator.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::TransferOperatorRegistry.

tbox::Pointer< hier::RefineOperator > SAMRAI::geom::SAMRAITransferOperatorRegistry::buildRefineOperator ( const tbox::Pointer< hier::Variable > &  var,
const std::string &  op_name 
) [protected, virtual]

Builds the SAMRAI RefineOperator with name op_name associated with the centering of variable var. Can be specialized by applications which introduce their own RefineOperators. Specialized class will add knowledge of how to build application's operators and will call SAMRAITransferOperatorRegistry::buildRefineOperator to build a SAMRAI libaray RefineOperator.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::TransferOperatorRegistry.

tbox::Pointer< hier::TimeInterpolateOperator > SAMRAI::geom::SAMRAITransferOperatorRegistry::buildTimeInterpolateOperator ( const tbox::Pointer< hier::Variable > &  var,
const std::string &  op_name 
) [protected, virtual]

Builds the SAMRAI TimeInterpolateOperator with name op_name associated with the centering of variable var. Can be specialized by applications which introduce their own TimeInterpolateOperators. Specialized class will add knowledge of how to build application's operators and will call SAMRAITransferOperatorRegistry::buildTimeInterpolateOperator to build a SAMRAI libaray TimeInterpolateOperator.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::TransferOperatorRegistry.
